name: PickupOverrides
author: kafeijao
description:
Allows to override a few settings for all the pickups in the scene.

__**Auto-Hold**__ whether the pickups will stick to your hand or not, to drop a Auto-Held pickup you need to squeeze the right grip and pull the thumbstick back (both on the **right** controller even if the pickup is held on the left controller)

__**Throw Force Multiplier**__ value of the force to be multiplied when throwing pickups.

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/PickupOverrides) for more in-depth info.
